price: Yε’kyerεε wͻn kwan kͻͻ asεm papa no mu (wͻ wiase ha), na yεkyerεε wͻn kwan kͻͻ (Otumfoͻ no a) Ayeyie fata no no kwan no so.
arabic: وَهُدُوٓاْ إِلَى ٱلطَّيِّبِ مِنَ ٱلۡقَوۡلِ وَهُدُوٓاْ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطِ ٱلۡحَمِيدِ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wahudū ilā al-ṭayibi mina al-qawli wahudū ilā ṣirāṭi al-ḥamīdi
